akas: Tattoo Shockers Las Vegas Germany (alternative title)
akas from release info: Tattoo Shockers Las Vegas Germany (alternative title)

1.title: Turning the Other Butt Cheek
1.plot: Dirk and Ruckus are out patrolling the strip for bad tattoos when they run into Jules, a young lady suffering from bad tattoo decisions made on a trip to Sturgis. Jules' ink goes to show that "Buy One, Get One Free" isn't always the best deal. Then the guys meet Erica, a cutie who lives with regret over a tattoo she got back in high school. As a typical teenager trying to revolt she let her high school boyfriend tattoo her in an intimate area. And later, the guys get a call from Michael, an ex-male stripper and the victim of a tattoo that looks like he was attacked by...

2.title: Lost in Tattoo Translation
2.plot: While judging a local bikini bull-riding contest in Vegas, Dirk and Ruckus notice one of the contestants needs their help with a rather large problem. Kayla has ink so big and so bad, she has to wear a one-piece. This might be one tattoo even Dirk can't cover up. Next, the guys stop for lunch in Chinatown and meet Joanne, an extremely compassionate nurse with a tattoo that's interfering with her work. Her ink is in Chinese and it turns out, what it says isn't so nice. And later, Dirk and Ruckus get a call from Jordan, a girl living with a tattoo that's ruining her sex...

3.title: Babes in Tattooland
3.plot: Dirk and Ruckus do their patriotic duty for Bridgette, a military veteran with a wildly inappropriate tattoo that she has trouble explaining to her kids when they go to the beach.

4.title: Tat's My Mom
4.plot: A mom calls Dirk and Rukus about her son's very large tattoo mistake. Later, an adrenaline junkie meets with them to remedy her tattoo, in which the tattoo artist added his signature symbol, making for a shocking result. And lastly, a memorial tattoo is creepy, and Dirk is tasked with making it worthy of the beloved grandma.

5.title: Tat in the Hat
5.plot: Dirk and Ruckus meet up with Tiffany, a hot, young gun shop clerk with a big mistake permanently inscribed on her neck. Tiffany wanted to get a tattoo to represent her mother but ended up with a big mess that "momma" wasn't too fond of.

6.title: Last Man Stamping
6.plot: Dirk and Ruckus head to a Vegas cigar bar, where they meet Justin, a father and cub scout leader who got an extremely inappropriate tattoo in his youth. He wants to be able to wear shorts... without looks of disgust from other parents.

7.title: Oops, I Tatted Again
7.plot: Dirk and Ruckus get a call from Tonyia, a single mother who got a hilariously bad tattoo after losing a bet to her ex-husband over a game of pool. Only Dirk can help Tonyia transform this tattoo from a "prime piece of meat" to something more suitable.

8.title: Tat-Too Hot for TV
8.plot: Dirk is in for the biggest tattoo cover-up of his career when he meets Maxime, a French man with one of the most hilariously inappropriate tattoos the guys have ever laid their eyes on. Maxime's wife is ready to get rid of the "other lady," in his life!

9.title: Tat's Ink-redible!
9.plot: Dirk decides to pull a tattoo prank on Ruckus after years of dealing with his trickery so he teams up with Ruairi, a makeup artist from History's hit series, "Vikings." To thank Ruairi, Dirk gives him a real tattoo with a nod to his Norse-themed day job.

10.title: It Takes Two to Tattoo
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: A Damsel and a Nerd in Need
1.plot: Welcome to the "Mistake Capitol of the World": Las Vegas, where tattoo legend Dirk Vermin, and his best friend, Ruckus, are on a mission to find bad tattoos and transform them into works of art. They get a desperate call from Jacqui.

2.title: Monkey Business
2.plot: Dirk and Ruckus meet up with a "player" that thought he had all the right moves. Unfortunately, Lavon played himself into a tattoo disaster when he tried to impress the ladies with his bad ink.

3.title: Who Needs a Tattervention?
3.plot: Dirk and Ruckus are called by a desperate husband to stage a "tattervention" to convince his wife Kristen that her inappropriate tattoo has got to go. Then the guys meet Jordan out on the Vegas Strip.

4.title: Terrible Tattoo Showdown
4.plot: Dirk and Ruckus meet two college buddies with a bet to see who could get the worst tattoo. But they're not interested in cover-ups; Dirk is challenged to settle the score by making their tattoos even more ridiculous.

5.title: Tattoo Crimes and Misdemeanors
5.plot: I was the cop on the show. Dirk did my tat, and did a beautiful job. Rob and Dirk are great guys, and I did marry my wife on the show for real .

6.title: When Animal Tattoos Attack
6.plot: Vanessa got a tattoo out of spite and now it's getting in the way of her fitness model career. Dirk finds a way to turn her terrifying tattoo into a work of art. Ruckus plays a prank on Dirk.

7.title: Baby Mama Tattoo Drama
7.plot: Dirk and Ruckus come to the rescue of a new Mom that is convinced her bad tattoo is terrifying her newborn baby. Dirk has firsthand experience, being a Dad himself, so he gladly accepts the challenge to fix her ink..

8.title: All Is Fair in Love and Ink
8.plot: Dirk and Ruckus get a call from a girlfriend who desperately wants her boyfriend's arm tattoo removed... especially since it's a portrait of his ex-girlfriend! Later, the guys come to the rescue of a former bikini bar waitress.

9.title: The Family That Inks Together...
9.plot: Dirk and Ruckus are called in to convince a Dad that the horrible tattoo portrait of his wife has got to go. The whole family hates it, even mom! The problem is he isn't ready to cover it up. Dirk and Ruckus also meet Sharon.

11.title: Girls Gone Tattoo Wild
11.plot: A woman regrets getting a tattoo that was personally selected by her former boyfriend and now casts her in a negative light; an impulsive woman is branded with body art after having a bad day.

12.title: Show Me Your Tats
12.plot: Dirk and Ruckus meet Crystal, a former college party girl who got a tattoo in a very intimate place as a joke. Now that she's grown up and graduated, this tattoo that has quickly become a joke on her. Literally.

13.title: Close Encounters of the Butt Kind
13.plot: Rob and Dirk heads to the Public House in Las Vegas to meet Vince, a guy in town from Philly with an embarrassing tattoo in an even more embarrassing location. Next up, they get a call from Emily, who is making a move to Brooklyn.

14.title: Model Misbehavior
14.plot: Dirk and Rob come to the rescue of a model who made a rash decision after having a fight with her grandmother--she went to her local parlor and got a "Suck it Grandma" tattoo.

-1.title: Tramp Stamps Gone Wild
-1.plot: Jeremy had an obsession with Sea Monkeys that led to his decision to get a life altering tramp stamp he now regrets. Dirk and Ruckus have seen their fair share of tramp stamps, but a "man stamp"? This is new territory for them. They get a call to help a Grandmother who turns out to have a wild streak and a wild past. SJ is not your typical Grandma and her tattoo is just as wild.

imdb.title: Bad Ink
plot: Ruckus & Dirk seek out the worst tattoos in Las Vegas & offer to repair them for money.
